weka.clusterers

Class KValid

  • java.lang.Object
    • RandomizableClusterer
      • weka.clusterers.KValid

  • public class KValid
extends RandomizableClusterer
    KValid: SimpleKMeans with validation. For more information, see

    Davidson Francis (2017). https://github.com/Theldus/KValid/

      • clusterInstance

        public int clusterInstance(Instance instance)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Classifies a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to be assigned to a cluster
        Returns:
        the number of the assigned cluster if the class is enumerated, otherwise the predicted value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the instance could not be classified successfully.
